change.description: Examine mark below the qof as possible merkha. Add note 't'
change.refuni: yod hiriq qof dagesh qamats meteg het sof-pasuq

notes.note: The mark below the qof has the northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. Since this word occurs at the end of the verse, the mark should be a meteg acting as a siluq; a merkha is inappropriate here. Adding note 't'.
BHL has a meteg under the qof. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: tav dagesh sheva meteg alef tsere he hataf-patah bet ole vav dagesh
change.changeuni: tav dagesh sheva meteg alef tsere he hataf-patah bet ole vav dagesh maqaf

notes.note: The maqaf between the vav of this word and the pe of the following word is clear.
BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah ayin hataf-patah lamed patah ole tav maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah ayin hataf-patah lamed patah ole tav

notes.note: No maqaf is present between this word's tav and the following word's het.
BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: vav sheva he segol het hataf-segol zayin hiriq munah yod qof qamats he
change.changeuni: vav sheva he segol het hataf-segol zayin hiriq munah yod qof qamats he maqaf

notes.note: BHL has no maqaf on this word; BHLA has a maqaf on this word with a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Change qamats under tet to segol.
change.refuni: tet qamats munah bet patah het
change.changeuni: tet segol munah bet patah het

notes.note: BHL has a segol under the tet. BHLA has a note on another word, word 11.

change.description: Examine possible dagesh in first vav.
change.refuni: yod hiriq meteg shin shin-dot sheva vav vav dagesh maqaf
change.changeuni: yod hiriq meteg shin shin-dot sheva vav vav dagesh maqaf

notes.note: The putative dagesh in the first vav is lighter and larger than adjacent dots. This is likely to have been an erasure.
BHL has no dagesh in the first vav. BHLA has no note on this verse.

change.description: Examine qamats under the ayin. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: ayin qamats pe sheva resh merkha vav holam tav
change.changeuni: ayin qamats pe sheva resh merkha vav holam tav

notes.note: The dot under the horizontal line under the ayin is well-positioned and well-sized; but of reddish color. It will be transcribed as a qamats with a 't' note.
BHL has a patah under ayin. BHLA has a qamats under the ayin with a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Change mark under the tet to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: tet dehi vav holam bet
change.changeuni: tet tipeha vav holam bet

notes.note: The mark under the tet isn't sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available for it to be made prepositive. Adding a note 'd'.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the tet. BHLA makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under the mem to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: mem dehi vav dagesh samekh qamats resh
change.changeuni: mem tipeha vav dagesh samekh qamats resh

notes.note: The mark under the mem is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi, although space is available to do so.
BHA has a dehi below the mem. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine the mark under the resh as possible merkha. Place the meteg before the hiriq under the resh with a CGJ. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: alef patah kaf sheva zayin qamats resh hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: alef patah kaf sheva zayin qamats resh meteg CGJ hiriq yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: The mark below the qof has the northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. Since this word occurs at the end of the verse, the mark should be a meteg acting as a siluq; a merkha is inappropriate here. Adding note 't'.
BHL has a meteg after the hiriq. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under bet to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: bet dagesh dehi vav holam tet segol he
change.changeuni: bet dagesh tipeha vav holam tet segol he

notes.note: The mark under the bet isn't sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Adding note 'd'.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under alef to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: alef holam dehi kaf segol lamed
change.changeuni: alef holam tipeha kaf segol lamed

notes.note: The mark under the alef is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Space is available write the mark prepositively. Add note 'd'.
The Aleppo Codex and the BHL have a dehi under the alef. BHLA has a tipeha under the alef.

change.description: Add maqaf to end of word.
change.refuni: ayin holam munah shin shin-dot tsere meteg qof
change.changeuni: ayin holam munah shin shin-dot tsere meteg qof maqaf

notes.note: BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has a maqaf at the end of this word.

change.description: Change dehi under shin to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot holam dehi mem patah ayin patah tav
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot holam tipeha mem patah ayin patah tav

notes.note: The mark under the shin is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to lamed. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed holam alef maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed dagesh holam alef maqaf

notes.note: The putative dagesh is dark, well-formed, but slightly off-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHLA has a dagesh in the lamed with a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Examine tsere under the lamed as a possible segol. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed tsere bet maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed tsere bet maqaf

notes.note: The text is in poor condition on this page. The lower dot of a putative segol under the lamed is very indistinct and off-centered.
BHL has a tsere under the lamed. BHLA has a note for word 8, but not for this word.

change.description: Remove revia over the alef.
change.refuni: alef patah geresh-muqdam revia final-pe
change.changeuni: alef patah geresh-muqdam final-pe

notes.note: BHL has no revia over the alef. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from kaf.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh sheva samekh hiriq yod lamed hiriq meteg yod final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: kaf sheva samekh hiriq yod lamed hiriq meteg yod final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: The inner space of the kaf is empty; possibly something was erased.
BHL has a dagesh in the kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine dagesh in first yod. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: he patah dehi yod dagesh patah yod final-nun
change.changeuni: he patah dehi yod dagesh patah yod final-nun

notes.note: The dagesh in the first yod is hard to see.
BHL has a dagesh in the first yod. BHLA has no dagesh in the first yod.

change.description: Change dehi under tav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: tav dagesh dehi vav holam ayin segol he
change.changeuni: tav dagesh tipeha vav holam ayin segol he

notes.note: The mark under the tav is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Move meteg under vav to precede the segol adding CGJ after meteg.
change.refuni: mem patah lamed sheva vav segol meteg he sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem patah lamed sheva vav meteg CGJ segol he sof-pasuq

notes.note: The meteg clearly appears before the segol. The CGJ is added to preserve the mark ordering.
BHL has the meteg after the segol. BHLA has the meteg before the segol.

change.description: Change dehi under vav to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: vav dagesh dehi shin shin-dot sheva mem patah ayin
change.changeuni: vav dagesh tipeha shin shin-dot sheva mem patah ayin

notes.note: The mark under the vav is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Add note 'd'.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the vav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to mem. Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh sheva mem vav holam maqaf
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva mem dagesh vav holam

notes.note: The text has poor quality; however, the dagesh in the mem and lack of maqaf are clear.
BHL has no dagesh in the mem and no maqaf at the end of the word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to first yod.
change.refuni: yod patah yod hiriq final-nun zinor
change.changeuni: yod dagesh patah yod hiriq final-nun zinor

notes.note: The dagesh in the first yod is dark and well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the first yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Move holam from vav to tet and add dagesh to vav.
change.refuni: tet meteg vav holam bet sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tet holam meteg vav dagesh bet sof-pasuq

notes.note: A dark, but connected holam is visible at the end of the tet. Visually it belongs to the tet, not the vav.
The dagesh in the vav is poorly shaped; however, it is well-positioned and dark.
BHL has a holam on the vav and no dagesh in the vav. BHLA has a holam on the vav and a dagesh in the vav.

change.description: Add dagesh to samekh.
change.refuni: mem vav dagesh samekh qamats meteg resh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem vav dagesh samekh dagesh qamats meteg resh sof-pasuq

notes.note: The dagesh in the samekh is well-positioned and dark.
BHL has no dagesh in the samekh. BHLA has a dagesh in the samekh and a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Change merkha under yod to munah.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva mem patah shin sin-dot sheva kaf dagesh hiriq yod dagesh merkha vav holam tav
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva mem patah shin sin-dot sheva kaf dagesh hiriq yod dagesh munah vav holam tav

notes.note: The accent under the yod is clearly a munah rather than a merkha.
BHL has a munah under the yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to lamed.
change.refuni: lamed holam alef maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed dagesh holam alef maqaf

notes.note: The dot within the lamed is well-positioned and well-formed.
BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHLA has a dagesh in the lamed.

change.description: Change meteg under resh to merkha.
change.refuni: resh tsere meteg ayin hataf-patah final-kaf qamats qadma
change.changeuni: resh tsere merkha ayin hataf-patah final-kaf qamats qadma

notes.note: The line under the resh has a northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. The kaf has two near-vertical marks above it; the first of them is a meteg on the the word יְשַׂמַּֽח־ from the preceding line, verse 27:9.3 .
BHL has a merkha under the resh. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine accent under tet as being a tipeha rather than a dehi. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: tet dehi vav holam resh tsere dalet
change.changeuni: tet dehi vav holam resh tsere dalet

notes.note: The accent under the text is very slightly prepositive.
BHL has a dehi under the tet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove markings under the gimel; examine a possible maqaf at the end of word. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: gimel dagesh segol munah bet segol resh
change.changeuni: gimel dagesh bet segol resh

notes.note: The text is in very bad shape in this region. The markings under the gimel are uncertain and will be removed. No maqaf is visible at the end. Adding note 't'.
BHL has a segol then munah under the gimel and no maqaf at the end. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change meteg below gimel to merkha. Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: gimel dagesh patah meteg final-mem maqaf
change.changeuni: gimel dagesh patah merkha final-mem

notes.note: The line under the gimel has a very slight northeast-to-southwest inclination and can be transcribed as a merkha.
BHL has a merkha under the gimel and no maqaf at the end of the word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change merkha under he to meteg. Add note 'm'.
change.refuni: nun hiriq meteg bet hataf-qamats he qamats merkha lamed
change.changeuni: nun hiriq meteg bet hataf-qamats he qamats meteg lamed

notes.note: The line under the he lacks the northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha.
BHL has a meteg under the nun and a merkha under the he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to nun.
change.refuni: nun patah pe sheva shin shin-dot etnachta vav holam
change.changeuni: nun dagesh patah pe sheva shin shin-dot etnachta vav holam

notes.note: The dot in the nun is brownish, but well-positioned and well-sized.
BHL has no dagesh in the nun. BHLA has a dagesh in the nun and a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Add dagesh to mem.
change.refuni: alef hiriq mem sheva resh patah munah tav
change.changeuni: alef hiriq mem dagesh sheva resh patah munah tav

notes.note: The dot is small, but distinct and well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the mem. BHLA has dagesh in the mem and a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Change munah under kaf to meteg.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot tsere kaf qamats munah resh
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot tsere kaf qamats meteg resh

notes.note: The line under the kaf has insufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha. It's clearly not a munah, however.
BHL has a munah under the kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word. Add note 'm'.
change.refuni: vav sheva tav meteg vav holam resh patah tav maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva tav meteg vav holam resh patah tav

notes.note: The line under the first tav lacks sufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha. Adding note 'm'.
BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word; however, it has a merkha under the first tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove the dagesh from the tsadi.
change.refuni: mem hiriq tsadi dagesh hiriq nun dagesh hiriq merkha yod final-mem
change.changeuni: mem hiriq tsadi hiriq nun dagesh hiriq merkha yod final-mem

notes.note: No evidence for a dagesh in the tsadi is available.
BHL has no dagesh in the tsadi. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine specks near lamed as possible dageshes.
change.refuni: lamed qamats meteg final-kaf sheva sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: lamed qamats meteg final-kaf sheva sof-pasuq

notes.note: Two small specks appear before and after the lamed. Although they are dark, they are much smaller than the sheva dots in the kaf.
BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add revia above the mem. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: vav sheva kaf hiriq yod mem tsere tipeha yod
change.changeuni: vav sheva kaf hiriq yod mem tsere tipeha revia yod

notes.note: The markings above the mem are confusing. The rightmost group is possibly a broken masora circle; however, a very clear, dark dot appears on the left. If the dot above the mem is taken as a revia, then the mem has two accents, a tipeha and a revia, which is very strange.
BHL has no revia above the mem. BHLA has both a revia and tipeha on the mem.

change.description: Add dagesh to vav.
change.refuni: vav sheva geresh-muqdam alef patah het hataf-patah resh hiriq yod tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia
change.changeuni: vav dagesh sheva geresh-muqdam alef patah het hataf-patah resh hiriq yod tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia

notes.note: BHL has no dagesh in the vav. BHLA has a dagesh in the vav.

change.description: Consider adding a transcription note 't' because revia over bet is obscured by a rafe.
change.refuni: ayin patah geresh-muqdam kaf dagesh qamats bet hiriq revia yod shin shin-dot
change.changeuni: ayin patah geresh-muqdam kaf dagesh qamats bet hiriq revia yod shin shin-dot

notes.note: The revia is visible in the left edge of the (untranscribed) rafe.
BHL has a revia over the bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine mark below the he as being a tipeha instead of a dehi.
change.refuni: he dehi vav dagesh alef
change.changeuni: he dehi vav dagesh alef

notes.note: The mark below the he is slightly displaced to the right allowing it to be transcribed as a dehi.
The Aleppo Codex and BHL have a dehi under the he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove meteg under the mem. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: ayin hiriq mem dagesh meteg vav holam sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: ayin hiriq mem dagesh vav holam sof-pasuq

notes.note: No meteg is present under the mem.
BHL has a meteg under the mem. BHLA has no meteg under the mem and has a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Remove meteg under pe. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh patah pe dagesh qamats meteg yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh patah pe dagesh qamats yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: No meteg is apparent under the pe.
BHL has a meteg under the pe. BHLA has no meteg under the pe and a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Change dehi under vav to meteg; change merkha under tav to meteg with an 'm' note.
change.refuni: vav dagesh dehi lamed sheva het patah tet dagesh qamats alef tav hiriq merkha yod
change.changeuni: vav dagesh meteg lamed sheva het patah tet dagesh qamats alef tav hiriq meteg yod

notes.note: The mark under the vav, currently transcribed as a dehi, is not sufficiently inclined to be taken as either a tipeha or dehi. The dehi in the previous text will be transcribed as a meteg. The merkha under the tav is not sufficiently inclined to be transcribed as a merkha. The merkha in the previous text will be transcribed as a meteg with an 'm' note.
BHL has a meteg under the vav and a merkha under the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine meteg/merkha accent under the first tav.
change.refuni: tav dagesh patah meteg ayin hataf-patah lamed qubuts mem munah vav holam tav
change.changeuni: tav dagesh patah meteg ayin hataf-patah lamed qubuts mem munah vav holam tav

notes.note: The line under the tav has insufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha.
BHL has a meteg under the tav. BHLA has an entry for word 12 of this verse, but none on this word.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: vav sheva alef segol tav maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva alef segol tav

notes.note: BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no maqaf at the end of this word.

change.description: Change meteg under alef to tipeha.
change.refuni: vav sheva alef tsere meteg tav qamats nun hiriq munah yod final-mem
change.changeuni: vav sheva alef tsere tipeha tav qamats nun hiriq munah yod final-mem

notes.note: The mark under the alef is clearly inclined northwest-to-southeast.
BHL has a tipeha under the alef. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to yod. Move patah from het to yod.
change.refuni: mem tsere resh tsere munah yod het patah
change.changeuni: mem tsere resh tsere munah yod dagesh patah het

notes.note: The dagesh in the yod is brownish, but well-positioned and well-sized. The patah is too far to the right to belong to the het.
BHL has no dagesh in the yod; it has a patah under the het. BHLA has a dagesh in the yod and a patah under the yod.

change.description: Change merkha under shin to meteg. Add note 'm'.
change.refuni: tav dagesh qamats mahapakh shin shin-dot hiriq merkha yod tav
change.changeuni: tav dagesh qamats mahapakh shin shin-dot hiriq meteg yod tav

notes.note: The line under the shin lacks the northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha. Adding note 'm'.
The mark under the second tav in the image is from the word הֲיִ֫חְיֶ֥ה, Prov 14:14.4, on the following line.
BHL has a merkha under the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add merkha after meteg on shin.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot holam meteg het patah dalet sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot holam meteg merkha het patah dalet sof-pasuq

notes.note: The merkha is well-inclined and distinct from the meteg.
BHL has only a meteg under the shin. BHLA has a meteg followed by a merkha under the shin.

change.description: Remove munah under the yod. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva yod qamats munah lamed holam dalet
change.changeuni: vav sheva yod qamats lamed holam dalet

notes.note: The text is in bad condition and poorly written near this word. A munah under the yod is not evident and will be removed. A meteg under the lamed (seen in BHL) isn't evident, either. A transcription note 't' will be added drawing attention to both the yod and the lamed.
BHL has a qamats then munah under the yod and a meteg under the lamed. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change patah under he to hataf-patah. Add dagesh to mem.
change.refuni: he patah dehi lamed sheva mem patah ayin patah nun sheva final-kaf qamats
change.changeuni: he hataf-patah dehi lamed sheva mem dagesh patah ayin patah nun sheva final-kaf qamats

notes.note: The patah under the he is barely visible. The dagesh in the mem is dark and reasonably well-positioned.
BHL has a patah under the he and has no dagesh in the mem. BHLA has a hataf patah under the he and NO dagesh in the mem.

change.description: Change dehi under alef to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: alef dehi vav holam resh
change.changeuni: alef tipeha vav holam resh

notes.note: The accent below the alef isn't sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi. Add note 'd'.
BHL has a dehi below the alef. BHLA has a tipeha below the alef.

change.description: Remove sheva under the kaf.
change.refuni: vav dagesh meteg tav sheva dalet patah kaf dagesh sheva alef vav dagesh nun patah merkha nun hiriq yod
change.changeuni: vav dagesh meteg tav sheva dalet patah kaf dagesh alef vav dagesh nun patah merkha nun hiriq yod

notes.note: An erasure under the kaf is apparent.
BHL has no sheva under the kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine dagesh in tav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: het segol resh sheva pe dagesh qamats tav dagesh hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: het segol resh sheva pe dagesh qamats tav dagesh hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: The dot in the tav is light and brownish, but is well-positioned and right-sized. The page doesn't have a lot of similar dots.
BHL has no dagesh in the tav. BHLA has a dagesh in both the pe and the tav with a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Add dagesh to qof.
change.refuni: qof qamats dehi resh qamats alef tav hiriq yod
change.changeuni: qof dagesh qamats dehi resh qamats alef tav hiriq yod

notes.note: The dagesh in the qof is brownish and larger than normal, but well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the qof. BHLA has a dagesh in the qof with a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Examine tipeha/dehi under the tav.
change.refuni: tav holam dehi alef mem sheva resh vav dagesh
change.changeuni: tav holam dehi alef mem sheva resh vav dagesh

notes.note: The tipeha/dehi under the tav is very slightly prepositive and will be transcribed as a dehi.
The Aleppo Codex and the BHL have a dehi under the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change sheva under vav to hiriq. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva lamed holam meteg alef maqaf
change.changeuni: vav hiriq lamed holam meteg alef maqaf

notes.note: No sign of a sheva is present; the hiriq dot is brownish and ill-positioned.
BHL has a sheva under the vav. BHLA has a hiriq under the vav.

change.description: Change meteg under shin to merkha.
change.refuni: vav dagesh geresh-muqdam tav sheva shin shin-dot meteg vav dagesh bet holam tav tsere yod kaf segol revia final-mem
change.changeuni: vav dagesh geresh-muqdam tav sheva shin shin-dot merkha vav dagesh bet holam tav tsere yod kaf segol revia final-mem

notes.note: The mark below the shin has the distinct northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha.
BHL has a merkha under the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine mark below lamed as possible merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed qamats meteg final-kaf sheva sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: lamed qamats meteg final-kaf sheva sof-pasuq

notes.note: The mark below the lamed has the distinctive northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. However, this is the last word in the verse and the writer probably intended a meteg. Add note 't'.
BHL has a meteg below the lamed. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi below alef to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: alef dehi vav holam mem segol resh
change.changeuni: alef tipeha vav holam mem segol resh

notes.note: The mark below the alef is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a dehi under the alef. BHLA has a tipeha under the alef.

change.description: Examine mark below alef as possible merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: alef meteg vav holam resh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: alef meteg vav holam resh sof-pasuq

notes.note: The mark below the alef has the distinctive northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. However, this is the last word in the verse and the writer probably intended a meteg. Add note 't'.
BHL has a meteg below the alef. BHLA has no entry for this word, though it does have an entry for word 2.

change.description: Examine mark below tav as possible merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: alef patah nun sheva het qamats tav hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: alef patah nun sheva het qamats tav hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: The mark below the tav has the distinctive northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. However, this is the last word in the verse and the writer probably intended a meteg. Add note 't'.
BHL has a meteg below the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine mark below tav as possible merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: tav dagesh sheva kaf vav dagesh nun qamats tav meteg vav holam sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tav dagesh sheva kaf vav dagesh nun qamats tav meteg vav holam sof-pasuq

notes.note: The mark below the tav has the distinctive northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. However, this is the last word in the verse and the writer probably intended a meteg. Add note 't'.
BHL has a meteg below the second tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine mark below het as possible merkha. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: tav vav holam kaf qamats het meteg vav holam tav sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tav vav holam kaf qamats het meteg vav holam tav sof-pasuq

notes.note: The mark below the het has the distinctive northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha. However, this is the last word in the verse and the writer probably intended a meteg. Add note 't'.
BHL has a meteg below the het. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change meteg under first bet to merkha.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah meteg mem dagesh hiriq dalet sheva bet dagesh qamats revia resh
change.changeuni: bet dagesh patah merkha mem dagesh hiriq dalet sheva bet dagesh qamats revia resh

notes.note: The mark under the first bet has a distinct northeast-to-southwest inclination.
BHL has a merkha under the first bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change segol under ayin the tsere.
change.refuni: resh holam ayin segol munah he
change.changeuni: resh holam ayin tsere munah he

notes.note: The putative lower dot for the segol is very light. A similar light dots appear under the resh and before the munah under the ayin.
BHL has a segol under the ayin. BHLA has a tsere under the ayin and a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: het patah yod maqaf
change.changeuni: het patah yod

notes.note: No maqaf is apparent between the yod of this word and the following alef.
BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no maqaf at the end of this word.

change.description: Remove hiriq under the yod.
change.refuni: vav sheva ayin patah merkha yod hiriq final-nun
change.changeuni: vav sheva ayin patah merkha yod final-nun

notes.note: No hiriq is visible under the yod.
BHL has a hiriq under the yod . BHLA has no hiriq under the yod.

change.description: Change dehi under resh to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: resh dehi vav dagesh het patah
change.changeuni: resh tipeha vav dagesh het patah

notes.note: The mark under the resh is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a dehi under the resh. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Position meteg before the hiriq under the lamed using a CGJ.
change.refuni: resh patah gimel sheva lamed hiriq meteg yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: resh patah gimel sheva lamed meteg CGJ hiriq yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: The meteg is clearly before the hiriq. Insert a CGJ to position the marks properly.
BHL has the meteg after the hiriq. BHLA has the meteg before the hiriq.

change.description: Move meteg from under alef to under vav.
change.refuni: mem qubuts alef meteg vav dagesh final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem qubuts alef vav dagesh meteg final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: BHL has only a meteg (acting as a siluq) under the mem; it has no qubuts under the mem. The BHLA has a meteg (acting as a siluq) on the vav.

change.description: Change merkha under mem to meteg. Add note 'm'.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh holam ole alef mem patah merkha resh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh holam ole alef mem patah meteg resh

notes.note: The vertical mark under the mem lacks sufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be transcribed as a merkha. Adding note 'm'. The author points out the possible traces of a sof pasuq at the end of the word. If the verse had ended with this word, as suggested by the traces of the sof pasuq, then a meteg acting as a siluq would have been expected.
BHL has a merkha under the mem. BHLA has no entry for this word, word 6; it does have an entry for word 11.

change.description: Move hiriq under the second shin to follow the etnachta using a ZWJ.
change.refuni: yod sheva shin shin-dot hiriq yod shin shin-dot hiriq etnachta yod final-mem
change.changeuni: yod sheva shin shin-dot hiriq yod shin shin-dot etnachta ZWJ hiriq yod final-mem

notes.note: The etnachta clearly precedes the hiriq under the second shin.
BHL has the hiriq before the etnachta under the second shin. BHLA has the hiriq following the etnachta under the second shin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from dalet.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh tsere ayin hiriq munah yod
change.changeuni: dalet tsere ayin hiriq munah yod

notes.note: No sign of a dagesh is visible in the dalet.
BHL has no dagesh in the dalet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: lamed holam munah alef maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed holam munah alef

notes.note: BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Move ole from over yod to over ayin.
change.refuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah ole ayin hataf-patah bet holam merkha dalet vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva meteg yod patah ayin hataf-patah ole bet holam merkha dalet vav dagesh

notes.note: The ole is clearly over the ayin.
BHL has an ole over the ayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change merkha under lamed to meteg. Add note 'm'. Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: lamed holam merkha alef maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed holam meteg alef maqaf

notes.note: A maqaf may have been erased at the end of this word. The erasure has "dented" the top of the nun.
BHL has a merkha under the lamed and no maqaf at the end of the word. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change dehi under the lamed to tipeha. Add note 'd'.
change.refuni: lamed dehi vav holam
change.changeuni: lamed tipeha vav holam

notes.note: The mark under the lamed is not sufficiently prepositive to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a dehi under the lamed. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove the revia above the bet.
change.refuni: tav qamats geresh-muqdam bet hiriq revia yod final-nun
change.changeuni: tav qamats geresh-muqdam bet hiriq yod final-nun

notes.note: The only mark above the bet is a rafe which is not ordinarily transcribed here.
BHL has no revia above the bet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine markings above the resh.
change.refuni: alef segol geresh-muqdam bet sheva resh qamats revia he
change.changeuni: alef segol geresh-muqdam bet sheva resh qamats revia he

notes.note: The resh has 3 marks above it. Moving from right-to-left, the rightmost dot/blob is the transcribed revia. The second, middle, mark over the resh is the meteg on the samekh from the last word, word 8, יֶאֱסֹֽף׃ of the preceding verse, Job 39:12. The third, leftmost, mark over the resh is tail of the final pe of word 8.

Seth (Avi) Kadish offers a possible explanation for the rightmost dot/blob: The word אברה requires both a masorah circle and a small revia dot ( ◌֗ ). The masorah circle refers to the note ל' which says that אברה appears only once in the Bible (which is correct). The masorah circle may appear "malformed" precisely because the small dot for revia ( ◌֗ ) has collided with it.
BHL has a revia over the resh. BHLA has no revia over the resh and a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Remove meteg from under the het. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: het qamats meteg tav sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: het qamats tav sof-pasuq

notes.note: Although space is available to write a meteg under the het, none is visible. The verse should end with a meteg (acting as a siluq) on this word.
BHL has a meteg following the qamats under the het. BHLA has no meteg under the het.

change.description: Move darga under vav to under the yod.
change.refuni: vav patah darga yod dagesh holam samekh segol final-pe
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh darga holam samekh segol final-pe

notes.note: The text is in poor condition here. A faint patah can be seen under the vav. A faint darga can be seen directly under the yod.
BHL has a darga under the yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change munah under vav to meteg. Add note 'm'.
change.refuni: yod sheva he vav qamats munah he space paseq
change.changeuni: yod sheva he vav qamats meteg he space paseq

notes.note: Both the Aleppo Codex and BHL have a merkha under the vav. The accent under the vav lacks the northeast-to-southwest inclination for transcription as a merkha. Hence, a transcription note 'm' is added.
BHL has a merkha under the vav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Replace merkha under het with meteg. Add note 'm'.
change.refuni: het tsere merkha final-nun
change.changeuni: het tsere meteg final-nun

notes.note: The vertical line under the het has insufficient northeast-to-southeast inclination to be transcribed as a merkha.
BHL has a merkha under the het. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: vav sheva telisha-gedola yod hiriq shin shin-dot dagesh hiriq yod dagesh qamats he vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva telisha-gedola yod hiriq shin shin-dot hiriq yod dagesh qamats he vav dagesh

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the shin.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no dagesh in the shin.

change.description: Move dagesh from second mem to third mem.
change.refuni: vav dagesh mem hiriq mem dagesh patah mem sheva lamed qamats kaf qamats tipeha he
change.changeuni: vav dagesh mem hiriq mem patah mem dagesh sheva lamed qamats kaf qamats tipeha he

notes.note: The first column on this page is single width; the second column is double width. An odd thickening occurs in the left vertical part of the first mem. The dagesh in the third mem is clear.
BHL has a dagesh in the second mem only. BHLA has a dagesh in the third mem only.

change.description: Word is usually split with a maqaf between the yod and the kaf. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: alef patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod kaf tsere zaqef-qatan final-nun
change.changeuni: alef patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod kaf tsere zaqef-qatan final-nun

notes.note: No space or maqaf is present between the yod and the kaf.
BHL has a maqaf between the yod and the kaf. BHLA has no space or maqaf between the yod and the kaf.

change.description: Remove dagesh from zayin.
change.refuni: ayin qubuts zayin dagesh hiriq yod dagesh qamats meteg he vav dagesh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: ayin qubuts zayin hiriq yod dagesh qamats meteg he vav dagesh sof-pasuq

notes.note: Note: This verse is split by a samekh closed spacing marker between the 6-th and 7-th words.
BHL has a dagesh in the zayin. BHLA has no dagesh in the zayin.

change.description: Word is usually split with a maqaf between the yod and the kaf. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: alef meteg CGJ patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod kaf tsere pazer final-nun
change.changeuni: alef meteg CGJ patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod kaf tsere pazer final-nun

notes.note: No space or maqaf is visible between the yod and the kaf.
BHL has a maqaf between the yod and the kaf. BHLA has a space between the yod and the kaf.

change.description: Word usually is split by a maqaf between the yod and the kaf. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: vav sheva alef patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod kaf tsere revia final-nun
change.changeuni: vav sheva alef patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod kaf tsere revia final-nun

notes.note: No space or maqaf is apparent between the yod and the kaf. A smudge, possibly an erasure, appears under the alef. The tsere under the kaf is displaced due the presence of the lamed on the following line.
BHL has a maqaf between the yod and the kaf. BHLA has neither a space nor a maqaf between the yod and the kaf.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh patah bet dagesh qamats revia tav
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh patah bet dagesh qamats revia tav

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the shin.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin . BHLA has no dagesh in the shin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh patah bet dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan tav
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot patah bet dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan tav

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the shin.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no dagesh in the shin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh patah bet dagesh qamats etnachta tav
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot patah bet dagesh qamats etnachta tav

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the shin.
BHL has a dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no dagesh in the shin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from zayin.
change.refuni: ayin qubuts zayin dagesh hiriq yod dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan he vav dagesh
change.changeuni: ayin qubuts zayin hiriq yod dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan he vav dagesh

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the zayin.
BHL has a dagesh in the zayin. BHLA has no dagesh in the zayin.

change.description: Remove dagesh from zayin and from yod.
change.refuni: ayin qubuts zayin dagesh hiriq yod dagesh qamats munah he vav dagesh
change.changeuni: ayin qubuts zayin hiriq yod qamats munah he vav dagesh

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in either the zayin or the yod. The hiriq of the zayin appears quite "late" (probably pushed off by the descender of the ayin), so late that it fuses with the dot of the qamats (Ben Denckla).
BHL has a dagesh in both the zayin and the yod. BHLA has no dagesh in either the zayin or the yod.

change.description: Examine possible dagesh in het. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed sheva mem tsere munah resh qamats het zaqef-qatan vav holam qof
change.changeuni: lamed sheva mem tsere munah resh qamats het zaqef-qatan vav holam qof

notes.note: A reddish dot appears in the lower center of the het. It is slightly larger than other dots on the page, is lower vertically than expected, but is well-centered horizontally. It will be considered to be an artifact and noted with a 't'.
BHL has no dagesh in the het. BHLA has a dagesh in the het and a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: ayin qubuts zayin dagesh hiriq yod dagesh qamats qadma he vav dagesh
change.changeuni: ayin qubuts zayin dagesh hiriq yod qamats qadma he vav dagesh

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the yod.
BHL has a dagesh in both the zayin and the yod. BHLA has no dagesh in the yod.

change.description: Add yod after resh.
change.refuni: bet dagesh hiriq meteg yod resh qamats nun hiriq yod dagesh tipeha vav holam tav
change.changeuni: bet dagesh hiriq meteg yod resh qamats yod nun hiriq yod dagesh tipeha vav holam tav

notes.note: A yod is apparent after the resh. The yod has no other markings.
BHL has no yod after the resh; it has 2 yods. BHLA has a yod after the resh; it has 3 yods.

change.description: Change qamats below shin to hataf-qamats. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: lamed hiriq yod resh vav dagesh shin shin-dot qamats lamed qamats meteg CGJ hiriq final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: lamed hiriq yod resh vav dagesh shin shin-dot hataf-qamats lamed qamats meteg CGJ hiriq final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: A sheva is apparent below the shin before the qamats suggesting a hataf-qamats. This is very unusual.
BHL has no sheva under the shin. BHLA has a hataf-qamats under the shin.

change.description: Remove patah from ayin.
change.refuni: zayin sheva resh munah vav holam ayin patah
change.changeuni: zayin sheva resh munah vav holam ayin

notes.note: No patah is apparent under the ayin.
BHL has a patah under the ayin. BHLA has no patah under the ayin.

change.description: Add dagesh to first vav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: tav dagesh hiriq meteg shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh patah het hataf-patah vav tipeha vav dagesh
change.changeuni: tav dagesh hiriq meteg shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh patah het hataf-patah vav dagesh tipeha vav dagesh

notes.note: A dagesh is visible in the first vav although it is attached to the shaft of the vav. It is well-positioned vertically.
BHL has no dagesh in the first vav. BHLA has a dagesh in the first vav.

change.description: Add dagesh to yod.
change.refuni: vav dagesh shin shin-dot sheva mem patah meteg ayin sheva yod qamats qadma he vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav dagesh shin shin-dot sheva mem patah meteg ayin sheva yod dagesh qamats qadma he vav dagesh

notes.note: The dagesh in the yod is apparent.
BHL has no dagesh in the yod. BHLA has a dagesh in the yod.

change.description: Remove dagesh from tav.
change.refuni: alef segol tav dagesh maqaf
change.changeuni: alef segol tav maqaf

notes.note: The putative dagesh is reddish, overly-large, and off-centered. Reddish splotches appear in the vicinity of the word.
BHL has no dagesh in the tav. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from zayin.
change.refuni: yod hiriq zayin dagesh sheva lamed munah vav dagesh
change.changeuni: yod hiriq zayin sheva lamed munah vav dagesh

notes.note: Although the following lamed has a slight bulge on the leading edge, it lacks enough size to be transcribed as a dagesh.
BHL has a dagesh in the zayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Consider dagesh in mem. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: mem dagesh sheva lamed qamats kaf zaqef-qatan vav holam tav
change.changeuni: mem dagesh sheva lamed qamats kaf zaqef-qatan vav holam tav

notes.note: The dagesh in the mem is slightly reddish and slightly over-sized, but well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the mem. BHLA has a dagesh in the mem.

change.description: Consider the near-vertical mark under the ayin.
change.refuni: tav dagesh sheva ayin holam meteg resh sheva resh tevir vav dagesh
change.changeuni: tav dagesh sheva ayin holam meteg resh sheva resh tevir vav dagesh

notes.note: The near-vertical mark under the ayin has a slight northeast-to-southwest inclination. Since the word already has a tevir on the resh, it's unlikely the writer intended a second accent on this word.
BHL has a meteg under the ayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine mark below ayin as possible hataf-patah.
change.refuni: tav dagesh patah ayin patah shin sin-dot hiriq meteg yod final-nun sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tav dagesh patah ayin patah shin sin-dot hiriq meteg yod final-nun sof-pasuq

notes.note: A dot appears below the tav; however, it is too far from the patah to be taken as the sheva shape of a hataf-patah. It's likely to be part of the tail of the tav.
BHL has hataf-patah under the ayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Consider possible dagesh in lamed. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed qamats zaqef-qatan he dagesh
change.changeuni: lamed qamats zaqef-qatan he dagesh

notes.note: A small, light, but well-positioned dagesh appears in the lamed. Add note 't'.
BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Examine all dageshes on this word. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: nun dagesh vav dagesh gimel tipeha vav holam tav
change.changeuni: nun dagesh vav dagesh gimel tipeha vav holam tav

notes.note: The text quality is poor and many dots might be considered as dageshes. The dagesh on the nun is light, but well-positioned and is the best candidate. The dagesh on the first vav is dark, but attached to the gimel. A potential dagesh/shuruq appears on the second vav, however, it is blurred and very light; whereas the holam is clear. A light dot even appears after the tav!

A dagesh in an initial nun is unexpected in normal Hebrew grammar; however, this particular dagesh in the nun is found in many Masoretic texts. Ben Denckla has found 115 instances of a dagesh in an initial nun in the UXLC. It is a special Masoretic form called a "דגש לתפארת הקריאה", or "accentual dagesh" (Reuben Alcalay Hebrew/English dictionary) meaning "elegant pronunciation". Thanks to Ben Denckla and Seth (Avi) Kadish for their comments on this dagesh.

Note: this verse has 4 words (of 16) marked with Masorah circles (not shown in the UXLC). They appear on words 3, 9, 12, and 13 (this word); all 4 of the Masoretic marginal notes indicate that these words are unique in the Tanach. This is confirmed by a consonants-only search of the UXLC text for each word.
BHL agrees with the existing UXLC text. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from qof.
change.refuni: mem sheva bet patah qof dagesh sheva shin shin-dot hiriq munah yod final-mem
change.changeuni: mem sheva bet patah qof sheva shin shin-dot hiriq munah yod final-mem

notes.note: The dot in the qof is well-positioned but small, reddish, and very light. The dot in the final mem is ill-positioned, small, reddish, and very light. Other dots in this word are dark.
BHL has no dagesh in the qof. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change revia above alef to zaqef qatan.
change.refuni: vav dagesh resh sheva alef revia vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav dagesh resh sheva alef zaqef-qatan vav dagesh

notes.note: The text is on the last line of column 2 and is poorly written. A zaqef qatan with the lower dot touching the alef is apparent. The dot near the top of the shown photo is from a qamats on the previous line.
BHL has a zaqef qatan over the alef. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Move pashta over resh to over gimel.
change.refuni: he qamats resh patah pashta gimel sheva tav dagesh qamats pashta
change.changeuni: he qamats resh patah gimel sheva pashta tav dagesh qamats pashta

notes.note: The pashta is clearly on the gimel.
BHL has the pashta over the resh. BHLA has the pashta over the gimel

change.description: Examine segol under the shin as a possible qamats. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: mem hiriq shin shin-dot dagesh segol zaqef-qatan lamed segol gimel
change.changeuni: mem hiriq shin shin-dot dagesh segol zaqef-qatan lamed segol gimel

notes.note: The upper two dots on the vowel are unusually close as compared to those under the lamed and might be taken as a qamats. The segol will be retained and a note 't' added.
BHL has a segol under the shin. BHLA has a qamats under the shin with a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Change segol under shin to sheva. Examine possible dagesh in he.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot segol he merkha vav dagesh alef
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot sheva he merkha vav dagesh alef

notes.note: The sheva is clear; the putative dagesh in the he is very light and indistinct compared to other dots in this word.
BHL has a sheva under the shin; it has no dagesh in the he. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Consider merkha under zayin as possible tevir. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: zayin segol merkha he
change.changeuni: zayin segol merkha he

notes.note: The vertical bar of the accent under the zayin has a well-centered defect that appears to be a remnant of a missing dot. Restoring the dot would make the accent a tevir.
BHL has a merkha under the zayin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot segol yod dagesh hiriq pe dagesh zaqef-qatan vav holam lamed
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot segol yod hiriq pe dagesh zaqef-qatan vav holam lamed

notes.note: No dagesh appears in the yod.
BHL has no dagesh in the yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Consider the near-vertical mark below the ayin. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: ayin patah meteg lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: ayin patah meteg lamed maqaf

notes.note: The near-vertical mark is likely to have been intended as a meteg rather than a merkha because the poetic word, עַֽל־כֵּ֛ן , already has a tevir on it. The near-vertical mark is positioned below the patah. The meteg will be positioned after the patah and a note 't' added.

BHL has a meteg after a patah on the ayin; however, the BHL always positions metegs after the vowel as an editorial practice, so the BHL is not determinative of position in this case. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: yod dagesh vav holam tav tsere merkha resh
change.changeuni: yod vav holam tav tsere merkha resh

notes.note: The ink is very chipped on this word. No dagesh is apparent in the yod.
BHL has a dagesh in the yod. BHLA has no dagesh in the yod and has a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first yod.
change.refuni: he patah het patah yod dagesh hiriq meteg yod final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: he patah het patah yod hiriq meteg yod final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: A small bump appears on the leading edge of the second yod that might be taken as a dagesh. It's not enough to transcribe a dagesh on the first yod.
BHL has a dagesh in the first yod. BHLA has no entry for this word in this verse.

change.description: Change merkha under shin to tevir.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot segol merkha resh
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot segol tevir resh

notes.note: A clear and well-formed tevir follows the segol under the shin.
BHL has a tevir under the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to resh.
change.refuni: resh patah bet dagesh hiriq meteg yod final-mem sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: resh dagesh patah bet dagesh hiriq meteg yod final-mem sof-pasuq

notes.note: A well-positioned, reasonably-sized, dark dagesh appears in the resh. A resh does not ordinarily take a dagesh, however.
BHL has no dagesh in the resh. BHLA has a dagesh in the resh and a '?' in parentheses.

change.description: Remove dagesh from shin.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot dagesh segol yod dagesh hiriq meteg he sheva yod segol etnachta he
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot segol yod dagesh hiriq meteg he sheva yod segol etnachta he

notes.note: No dagesh appears in the shin; however, a smudging possibly due to erasure appears between the first two horns of the shin.
BHL has no dagesh in the shin. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from tsadi.
change.refuni: he patah tsadi dagesh patah dalet dagesh hiriq yod qof hiriq etnachta yod final-mem
change.changeuni: he patah tsadi patah dalet dagesh hiriq yod qof hiriq etnachta yod final-mem

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the tsadi.
BHL has a dagesh in the tsadi. BHLA has no dagesh in the tsadi.

change.description: Examine dagesh on second nun.
change.refuni: alef tsere yod nun segol merkha nun dagesh vav dagesh
change.changeuni: alef tsere yod nun segol merkha nun dagesh vav dagesh

notes.note: A distinctive bump occurs on the leading edge of the vav. It is well-positioned vertically and dark, but is small and in contact with the vav. It will remain a dagesh in the text.
BHL has a dagesh in the second nun. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot segol yod dagesh hiriq pe dagesh merkha vav holam lamed
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot segol yod hiriq pe dagesh merkha vav holam lamed

notes.note: No dagesh is apparent in the yod.
BHL has no dagesh in the yod. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to tet. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav hiriq meteg yod tet hiriq meteg yod bet sheva final-kaf qamats mahapakh
change.changeuni: vav hiriq meteg yod tet dagesh hiriq meteg yod bet sheva final-kaf qamats mahapakh

notes.note: The text is of poor quality around this word. A well-positioned and well-formed, but light dagesh appears in the tet. Adding a dagesh to the tet and a note 't'.
BHL has no dagesh in the tet. BHLA has a dagesh in the tet.

change.description: Change mahapakh on kaf to yetiv.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh hiriq mahapakh yod
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh hiriq yetiv yod

notes.note: The accent on the kaf has the prepositive position of yetiv.
BHL has a yetiv on the kaf. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Verify darga is under the dalet.
change.refuni: lamed sheva mem hiriq gimel dagesh qamats dalet darga vav holam lamed
change.changeuni: lamed sheva mem hiriq gimel dagesh qamats dalet darga vav holam lamed

notes.note: A darga is clearly present in both the LC and UXLC.
BHL has a darga under the dalet and agrees with the existing UXLC text. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq qof dagesh patah mahapakh het
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq qof dagesh patah mahapakh het

notes.note: No dagesh occurs in the yod.
BHL has a dagesh in the yod. BHLA has no dagesh in the yod.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq qof dagesh qamats resh sheva alef munah vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq qof dagesh qamats resh sheva alef munah vav dagesh

notes.note: NO dagesh is apparent in the yod.
BHL has a dagesh in the yod. BHLA has no dagesh in the yod.

change.description: Move mahapakh from under the gimel to under the dalet.
change.refuni: gimel qamats mahapakh dalet vav holam lamed
change.changeuni: gimel qamats dalet mahapakh vav holam lamed

notes.note: The mahapakh is under the dalet, not the gimel. The shape of the mahapakh is more curved on the left side than normal, however.
BHL has the mahapakh under the dalet. BHLA has no entry for this verse.

change.description: Change tsere under alef to segol.
change.refuni: alef tsere tav maqaf
change.changeuni: alef segol tav maqaf

notes.note: The accent under the alef is clearly a segol.
BHL has a segol under the alef. BHLA has no entry for this verse.
